title: Part of Fresco Painting from Pisa's Campo Santo (Teil eines Freskogemäldes vom Campo Santo zu Pisa) (plate facing page 72) from Gesammelte Schriften (Collected Writings)
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with eight lithographs
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 7 7/8 x 6 5/16" (20 x 16 cm); page: 11 7/16 x 9 3/16" (29 x 23.4 cm)
